channel.title: Black Mesa Gordon Freeman model
channel.description: I've been searching for a Gordon Freeman model that has the Black Mesa HEV suit on that I can use for SFM and Garry's Mod, rather than the HL2 HEV suit. Does such a thing even exist yet? Has anyone made one?

item.title: Black Mesa Gordon Freeman model
item.dc:creator: GilCMassey
item.description:
To answer the question, if there IS one, it’ll be in the community development sub forum. It may not exist though, cause BM hasn’t released its materials for modding I believe.

This is the sub forum it would most likely be in if it exists: https://forums.blackmesasource.com/forumdisplay.php?f=55

Read full topic
